how_much_coffee = lambda events: (lambda coffee: coffee if coffee< 4 else 'You need extra sleep')(sum(map(lambda x: 2 if x.isupper() else 1, filter(lambda x: __import__('re').match(r'(?i)^(cw|dog|cat|movie)$', x), events))))

import re
def how_much_coffee(events):
    if events:
        a = sum([1 if re.match('^(cw|cat|dog|movie)$',i) else 0 for i in events])
        b = sum([2 if re.match('^(CW|CAT|DOG|MOVIE)$',i) else 0 for i in events])
        return 'You need extra sleep' if (a+b)>3 else a+b
    return 0
